summary: A pianist finds himself once again facing the performance anxiety demons that he so desperately tries to evade.
cast: Grégoire Leprince-Ringuet|Danièle Lebrun|Grégory Gadebois|Emeline Gue|Nicolas Bimont|Guy Conrad|Nicole David|Christiane Guillon|Micheline Levchin|Jacques Treiner
keywords: piano tuner|first person narration|musical prodigy|playing piano|murder
title: L'accordeur
